heading: HB00546
0: AN ACT REQUIRING HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS TO REPORT PARTICIPATION AND PROGRAM SUPPORT EXPENDITURES IN ALL COLLEGE ATHLETIC PROGRAMS
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11180 enacted on 2019-01-03 Substituted by HB05152
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00546
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTIONS TO REPORT PARTICIPATION AND PROGRAM SUPPORT EXPENDITURES IN ALL COLLEGE ATHLETIC PROGRAMS
SHORT TITLE : Athletic Programs Report Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Requires colleges and universities to make public their sports programs and these institutions should inform prospective students of their athletic programs in order for them to make an informed judgement of whether enrol or not in these school.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAMBAR, MARK AERON H.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Batocabe (079 2017-03-07)2. Co (079 2017-03-07)
3. Sy-Alvarado (089 2017-05-15)
